title: Outplaying a veigar
body: You don't. Remove him you fucking inbred hillbilly cousin fuckers

replies.body: It's pretty easy most of the time to dodge his basic abilities.

+ W and E have massive wind up times, and give plenty of time to react.

+ His ult can be countered with Zhonya's Hourglass if you're skilled.

+ Q is a skill shot, little hard to dodge because of it's movement speed, but still dodge-able.
Banshee Veil or Zhonya GG. Git good
